resources.string: By using this application, you are promised to be constantly updated about rwanda\'s cultural heritage. we surely promise you that only recommendations matching your preferences will be sent to you. please take next steps to finish setting up you subscription
Welcome to the intelligent recommender system
congulatulations. you have reached your dashboard page. happy exploration

May be some fields are not field or filled with wrong data format. 

Username must be a single world without empty spaces. 

Email must include @ symbol. 

Phone number must not be less than 10 digits or grater than 13 digits.
